body_content.explanation: to put a new price on a product:
examples: Given the sheer number of items in the shop, repricing goods has been a logistical challenge.
The company repriced the drug at £8.57 per dose in order to help fund research.

body_content.explanation: to decide a new rate of interest on money that is borrowed or saved:
examples: Most providers of savings accounts will be repricing their rates at the beginning of next month.

body_content.explanation: to change the value of shares or other types of investments:
examples: Some companies have repriced options after their share prices fell.
